column5: Not in it, but thought it's a good link.......  http://64.177.125.54/Chantry/index.htm  The fishery is not as good as 5 or 6 years ago, when Ontario Out of Doors rated Kincardine as one of the top Salmon fishing locations in Canada.    Lack of prey for salmon is the main reason I believe and reasons for that are plenty.......lake trout, walleye, bass, jumbo perch etc are on the rise I hear but salmon and down rigging is going downhill..... She's no Lake Ontario or Lake Erie out on the big water.......
